original_text: But a donkey told him that he was not obeying God. We know that donkeys cannot talk. But that donkey spoke with a human voice. It stopped the prophet Balaam from doing more crazy things.
korean_text: 자기의 불법으로 말미암아 책망을 받되 말하지 못하는 나귀가 사람의 소리로 말하여 이 선지자의 미친 행동을 저지하였느니라

sentences.original_text: that he was not obeying God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님께 순종하지 않고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: We know that donkeys cannot talk
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 나귀가 말할 수 없다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: But that donkey spoke with a human voice
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 나귀는 사람의 목소리로 말했습니다
